website_summaries.verdict: Strong bits that come in 29 sizes and seem to stay sharp longer than others.
pros: Cobalt alloy can handle high heat
Works well on metal or wood
Price is good for the quality of the drill bits
Strong bits you can depend on
cons: These bits do still dull after a certain amount of use

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst drill bit set I've ever owned. I have barely had the set a month and have already broken 4 bits. I have had $60 sets that hold up 10x longer. The warranty is non existent, and there is absolutely no customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Conner

customer_reviews.title: Warranty not honored.
customer_reviews.text: They do not respond to email or website. Their warranty is invalid. I have broken bits and cannot get them to live up to their “lifetime” warranty. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not cut after 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: A few years ago I purchased a set of bits from a fellow that was giving a demonstration at a car show. Each bit worked well the first time and not afterwards. I just chalked it up to experience. Then I ordered a set of bits on line and was surprised to see that it was the same as the first manufacturer. The new bits lasted two to three usages before becoming useless. Big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BITS BACKED BY A GREAT COMPANY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best bits I have used. You get what you pay for. They are a little expensive but they have made my life when it comes to drilling a lot easier. It takes less effort with these to get threw the strongest metals. I broke a small bit, sent in the broken piece and got a new one in return. These bits are the greatest with a great company to back them. Make sure you register them when they arrive so you can take advantage of the lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: E. Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Sharp but not for long with metals
customer_reviews.text: Good bits, initially sharp, but don't hold sharpness after drilling iron and steel. At this price I think they should maintain sharpness longer. I'm still looking for bits that do.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gopen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bits
customer_reviews.text: Had to drill a hole in a metal bracket. Used some 3in1 oil at slow speed sliced right through.best drill bits I have ever owned. Sturdy box that keeps them organized. Was abe to find them cheaper after I had already bought them do a Google search before purchasing. I have learned my lesson
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Nippert

customer_reviews.title: Best Drill Bits I’ve Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: These drill bits are incredible. They remain sharp and are extremely tough. After regular use for a couple of years, one of the bits broke. I was using it in my drill press to drill out a stud on a rake handle and the bit became lodged between the steel framing of the rake. I sent the drill bit back to Drill Hog and received a new bit (free of charge) within two weeks! The bits and customer service are equally awesome!!! I’m a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Primera_Al

customer_reviews.title: he hates junk which I have learned in 37 years to buy him the good stuff. He says these drill bits "cruise"
customer_reviews.text: Another Christmas present for my husband. As a biker, he hates junk which I have learned in 37 years to buy him the good stuff. He says these drill bits "cruise". Recommend if you want an excellent product buy these !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: **Update.. They got back to me quickly, and they're sending a replacement. That's very quick turnaround considering everything that's going on! I've used this set very little. I save it for special projects. I was drilling through mild steal with cutting oil at the appropriate speed, and a bit just broke. The cutting head ended up in the hole. I've emailed the company for a replacement, so we'll see how that goes. Depending on that response, I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Fogus

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Both of the drill bits that I originally used dulled &grounded out after a few minutes of use. I was able to drill 1 hole through trailer frame steel. After that these bits would not drill the other hole that I needed. I used drilling oil to keep the bit from overheating but the bits still dulled and rounded out the tip. Very disappointed. Customer service did issue me a full refund after I returned the bits.
customer_reviews.author: ABLE

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift to my son. He really loves the drills. This is his first "cobalt" set. I am a retired industrial electrician. I have used cobalts for years to drill into stainless steel cabinets. Some good sets, some really terrible sets. So this set is a keeper! The price is acceptable as well for the good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lonni

customer_reviews.title: Great bits, hoping the lifetime warranty is easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bits, hoping the lifetime warranty is easy to use in the event I break one. As a professional mechanic I've spent well over $1000 over the years on drill bits. I even bought a Drill Doctor to tune bits up. These seem as good if not better than any other bits I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Ignasak

customer_reviews.title: Drill Hoggs warranty is a sham
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT! This product states that it has a life time warranty. We have tried to contact Drill Hogg for replacement drill bits that were warranted to no avail. After reading other reviews I see that other customers have had the same issue. Drill Hoggs warranty is a sham.
customer_reviews.author: Debra clifton

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow, quality bits. They drill nice, fast, and accurate. They are also guaranteed for a lifetime. In order to get the lifetime guarantee you must register the bits on their website with the attached serial number on the drill box.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Yes, the are expensive, but totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set after disappointing results with cheaper sets. These babies come ready for work. I have not used all of the bits yet, but all I have used are sharp. I’m using for my hobby metal work, up to 1/4 inch plate. For heavier material I use cutting oil to keep things a bit cooler. I couldn’t be happier! If you want holes....these are your bits. (Of Course the lifetime warranty is a selling point, but I haven’t needed it yet.)
customer_reviews.author: donnyjoe

customer_reviews.title: everything needs to be locked down good no movement
customer_reviews.text: Broke 4 same day I got them ,my fault ,everything needs to be locked down good no movement. These are good for drill press or a manual mill ,wouldn't recommend the smaller ones in a hand drill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Product!
customer_reviews.text: I can't count how many bits I've gone through installing our new steel building. Quite literally dozens, then I found this set. They are the best bits I've ever owned. They drilled cold formed steel, hot rolled steel, sheet metal where others snapped or dulled after just 2-3 holes, and in some cases 1/4" thick steel. I only gave 4 stars for longevity since I've owned them less than a month, but if you stack them up against all others, they could easily be given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID E CHRISTENSEN

customer_reviews.title: Still searching
customer_reviews.text: They do drill well, had a couple get dull though. I was very dissapointed they would not drill into a stainless steel exhaust stud I was trying to exact.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bits & Support
customer_reviews.text: These drill bits are great. I've used them to go through wood and steel, and I've had zero issues. They work much better than the bits they replaced. I broke the 1/8 drill bit going through some tough material and wrote the company for a replacement. They got back to me immediately and sent a new one. The lifetime warranty is no joke. I'm very happy with these bits and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Rigby

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: These are so sharp I cut my fingers removing them from the case. The case is a little cheap, stamped steel, but works OK. Was a little bent up from shipping and easily straightened up. Drilled through some pipes easily that had smoked titanium dewalt store bits. Love how well these cut. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: The best! Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you what... I’m 54 years old and I have burned, bent, broke, and dulled thousands of drill bits. I’m here to tell you right now, these bits will turn you arm and cordless drill motor into a hole blasting machine that will blow your mind. The best!
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Tisdale

customer_reviews.title: Great Product from a Great Company
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a set of these ever since the first summer I worked in General contracting. All the master contractors had them so I knew they were the ones to get. I just got a set for my brother with the major fixer upper he just bought. There was a small issue with the delivery but Drill Hog took care of everything and they did it faster than expected, I couldn't be happier with them!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey DeWandler

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime warranty but no process for replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Pros- they work great, go through 1/2" hard steel fairly easy, but they will break after several uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bits.
customer_reviews.text: Good bits....I have used them extensively on mild steel and they cut clean, fast and don't seem to dull.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me and Mine

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but very high quality. I have used these for drilling through 3/16" steel to re-deck a trailer among various other small projects. They hold up well. I use cutting fluid to drill steel so the bits will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Cole C.

customer_reviews.title: These things blow snap on bits out of the water ...
customer_reviews.text: These things blow snap on bits out of the water they will take a beating and stay sharp and if one breaks they replace it ive had myn for a few months now and i have not had one break yet drilling through solid steel
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Dooley

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF THERE "LIFETIME WARRANTY"
customer_reviews.text: Can't get any response trying to contact these people to use there "LIFETIME WARRANTY"..... They have no phone number so you contact them by e-mail... They DO NOT RESPOND!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: scott schramm

customer_reviews.title: The company has no integrity and does not stand by its product
customer_reviews.text: So far the warranty is non existent. Unable to get in touch with anybody. Had a drill bit break the second time using it. Would not recommend since getting a replacement seems impossible!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great metal bit kit worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, with all the Tap measurements identified, is a plus, super well built and put together bit kit, with all the sizes you need under a 1/2", worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Miller

customer_reviews.title: cut through mild steel like butter.
customer_reviews.text: these bits are sharp, cut through mild steel like butter....time will tell if they stay sharp.....
customer_reviews.author: R. Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Sharp Drill Bits
customer_reviews.text: These drills are amazingly sharp! I used them today for the first time, and they punched through everything I threw at them almost effortlessly. Use a little cutting oil with these drills, and I would venture to say that they will serve you well for many years to come. I would definitely buy these drill bits again
customer_reviews.author: Ed S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT DRILL BITS,PURCHASED THEM ABOUT A WEEK AGO AND SO FAR THEY ARE PROVEN WINNERS
customer_reviews.author: the goose

customer_reviews.title: Great bits
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, use a little tap magic and they will be around for a long time.f
customer_reviews.author: Bob the builder

customer_reviews.title: Best drill bits ever
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had better outside of machine shop, these are great
customer_reviews.author: S. van der Pol

customer_reviews.title: I hate it when drilling tough material and the drill spins ...
customer_reviews.text: They were need badly for my tailstock drill on a lathe ,.I hate it when drilling tough material and the drill spins in the drill chuck , causing surface damage to the jaws.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wisecarver

customer_reviews.title: Real nice
customer_reviews.text: They seem real nice. I registered the bits so hopefully the lifetime warranty is legitimately a lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Hop

customer_reviews.title: Just But Them!
customer_reviews.text: Best set of drill bits I've ever owned hands down.
customer_reviews.author: mytoocentz

customer_reviews.title: By far the best drill bits I've found so far
customer_reviews.text: By far the best drill bits I've found so far. I work as an industrial maintenance tech at a food processing plant, so most of the material that iwork with is stainless steel, which burns out bits very easily. Then came across these, while they cost a little more than some of the other sets I've looked at in the past they're worth every penny. Have been using them for a little over a month now and haven't had a single issue so far, will be buying some of the other sets soon.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Walt

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Obviously will last for long time and cut metal and wood perfectly well.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality I was looking for to avoid buying cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality I was looking for to avoid buying cheap PRC drill bits. This is made in USA! Industrial great with well designed storage box.
customer_reviews.author: paulyZ

customer_reviews.title: THESE THINGS ARE AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: THESE THINGS ARE AMAZING!!!!!! I'm hiding them and not sharing! I tried going trough hardened steal with 5 bits of all sorts like snap on HSS and all that, ordered these puppies up after 2 hours of drill bit research, tried them out and these bad boys cut curf strings a mile long and punched right through! buy em!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good drill bit set.
customer_reviews.text: This are very good drill bits, I'm very happy with this set, they cut the metal like butter and not breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a great price ..... sure beats paying twice as much on a tool truck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bits
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these bits. I've used a few of them and they have cut very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: An excellent set. Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Used to drill through marine grade stainless steel tubing. An excellent set. Very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Bozena Sajdlowska

customer_reviews.title: Robust appearance
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about these. I broke a 3/8"bit right off the the start in mild steel tubing. As I had registerd the bits I as supposed to obtain a free replacement. Sent the broken one in along with a copy of my registration. Appears they are sending the replacement back via Madagascar. Hopefully it shows up soon. Thes maller bits appear to be much sharper and stronger than my prior cobalt set. For the price I am hoping I made a good investment. Jury is out on that.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: How do I get a hold of them if a drill bit brakes? Love my set
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Conley

customer_reviews.title: Drill Hog is #1
customer_reviews.text: These bits shred metal and keep asking for more to devour!!! The warranty is top notch and Mike is very easy and very fast to deal with!
customer_reviews.author: Rita E.

customer_reviews.title: These drill bits are AMAZING! I have been rebuilding a truck and have ...
customer_reviews.text: These drill bits are AMAZING! I have been rebuilding a truck and have had to drill through the frame numerous times. I was able to drill 8 holes using the same bit and it stayed sharp the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Will outlast your drill press
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality drill bits. I have no doubt these are the real deal. They are well machined, they arrived sharp, and made easy work of drilling thru 1/4" angle. My drill press will wear out before these bits.
customer_reviews.author: AxemanVR

customer_reviews.title: Cuts through metal like it was nothing
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp drill bits! Cuts through metal like it was nothing. They are by far the best drill bits I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stronger and better than the ones I bought at big box hardware stores. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: CAPE

customer_reviews.title: If you like a tool that doesn't disappoint then this is it
customer_reviews.text: If you like a tool that doesn't disappoint then this is it. Performance is top notch and the warranty is proof the manufacturer stands behind their product! It's great to see these made in the USA drills do our country proud. Way to go!!!
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a drill bit set made in the USA -- worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Buy these bits
customer_reviews.text: Incredible bits with outstanding service. Will be buying more products from drill hog.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey d kostelecky

customer_reviews.title: USA drills at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of drills made in the good ole USA, I have not used them yet, but they look great and they have a great warranty too. So far 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D. Barretto

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: One bit broke and one bit dull after first use. Bought hoping for high quality but it wasn't very good.
customer_reviews.author: Tom O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bits, I like the faced shank that pervents ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bits, I like the faced shank that pervents spinning in the chuck. For the money I feel like they should drill through material faster. I used a hand held drill; maybe if they were used in a drill press results would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Pasch

product_meta.title: Drill Hog 29 Pc Cobalt Drill Bit Set M42 Drills Drill Hog
product_meta.description:
Drill Hog is proud to release the newest technology in drill bits. These bits are made from Cobalt M42 Steel which has a melting point of 2,853 degrees Fahrenheit! 

 These bits will drill through the toughest steel like truck frames, stainless steel, farm implements, spring steel, grade 8 bolts, and more! Proudly made in the USA. 

 Drill Hog includes a Lifetime Warranty to the original purchaser.
feature_bullets: Premium Solid Cobalt M42 Super High Speed Steel
1/16" to 1/2" in 1/64th Increments (Does not Skip any Sizes)
High Heat Treated Hardness 68-70 HRC (Rockwell Hardness Scale)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars103 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
